name: Candidate Name\s+([\w ]+)
mcq:

\s+Question ID\s+:\s+(?P<qid>\d+)
\s+Option 1 ID\s+:\s+(?P<o1id>\d+)

\s+Option 4 ID\s+:\s+(?P<o4id>\d+)
\s+Status\s+:\s+[\w\s]+
\s+Chosen Option\s+:\s+(?P<chosen>[-\d]+)
